short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Ethos credibility scores and data to enhance your Twitter experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ethos Extension for Twitter

Enhance your Twitter experience with the Ethos Chrome extension! Instantly view credibility scores for Ethereum addresses and linked Ethos profiles directly on Twitter.

Features:

— Ethereum Address Detection: Automatically detect Ethereum addresses in tweets and comments.
— Credibility Scores: Display Ethos credibility scores in tooltips.
— Clickable Links: Make Ethereum addresses clickable to view detailed Ethos profiles.
— Avatar Enhancements: Add credibility score badges to Twitter avatars of linked Ethos users.

How It Works:

— Automatic Detection: Identifies Ethereum addresses in Twitter content and wraps them with tooltips showing credibility scores.
— Profile Integration: Enhances Twitter avatars with credibility score badges for linked Ethos profiles.

Get Started:

1. Install the Ethos Extension: Available on the Chrome Web Store.
2. Explore Twitter: Automatically view credibility scores and linked profiles as you browse.

Privacy: The extension accesses only publicly available information and does not store personal data.
